titles: A godly ditty or prayer to be song vnto God for the preseruation of his Church, our Queene and realme, against all traytours, rebels, and papisticall enemies
author: Awdelay, John, fl. 1559-1577.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Elizabeth, 1558-1603 --  Poetry --  E.
